name: One Night Ninja
description:
After generations of peace, the lords of the land banded together and attacked your lands unprovoked. As the lone surviving ninja of your clan, vengeance has been left to you.

Having waited until the lords returned to their castles and fortresses, you invoke a ritual to seal all the rooms in the land. The effects will only last until daybreak, and the lords will surely seek you out at that time.

Your one night revenge begins now.

The game currently ends after Stage 3.

Credits

Music - Derek & Brandon Fiechter
Font - FreakyFonts on DaFont

Known Issues

- Wall cling sometimes faces the wrong direction

- Animator can get stuck in some states

- Need to jump or stop moving to dash a second time
